extracted_information: The provided web content for HyperEVM details its JSON-RPC interaction and an RPC endpoint. It mentions 'Mainnet' and 'Testnet' network types and notes the absence of official frontend components. Comprehensive details on dual-block architecture, gas mechanics, transaction formats, and precompiled contracts are not present in this content, though dual-block architecture is referenced as a subsequent topic.

features.name: EVM Interaction via JSON-RPC
features.description: All interaction with the EVM happens through the JSON-RPC.

features.name: Wallet Integration
features.description: Users can add the chain to their wallets by entering the RPC URL and Chain ID.

features.name: Frontend Agnostic
features.description: No official frontend components currently; users can build their own or port existing EVM applications.
